name: music-activity-booking
description: An easy, convenient music activity reservation website

scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: npx clean-css-cli -o public/css/styles.min.css public/css/layout.css public/css/responsive.css public/css/animations.css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser public/js/main.js public/js/form-handler.js public/js/gallery.js public/js/calendar.js public/js/supabase-client.js -o public/js/bundle.min.js
